Entries.Pauline2Hearts/f Pauline 500/p Pauline/p: playful/34 24/farmer 34 9 3 Pauline 35 24 3 Leah 33 24 1 /skippable/fade/viewport 34 24 true/pause 2800/showFrame Pauline 14/faceDirection Pauline 3/emote Pauline 32/speak Pauline "It’s funny, really. I always thought I’d miss the city, but now... I don’t think I could ever go back.$0"/pause 1000/speak Leah "Yeah, the city has its charm, but I’m so much happier here... the peace, the quiet, and the space to breathe."/pause 1000/jump Pauline/speak Pauline "Oh! Remember that party we went to? The one with the lights and music? It was fun, but...$2"/speak Leah "But it was *so* loud haha! And the people, bumping into each other, shouting over the music... it was exhausting.$1"/pause 500/speak Pauline "Exactly. I mean, we had some good times, but after a while, all that noise... it just grinds on you.$0"/move farmer 0 12 2/emote farmer 8/showFrame Pauline 8/emote Pauline 16/faceDirection Leah 0/pause 500/speak Pauline "Oh, hey @! We didn’t see you there!$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "We were just talking about the city. Do you miss it?$0"/question fork1 "#No, I like living here. It's simple and nice.#Yeah I do, I wish I could go back right now."/fork BadResponse/pause 500/emote Pauline 20/speak Pauline "I knew you’d say that! There’s something special about this place, right?$1"/pause 500/speak Leah "Yeah, it’s hard to imagine leaving this place behind once you’ve lived here."/pause 500/emote Leah 32/speak Leah "No matter what though, I’m glad we’re all here now. This feels like home.$1"/pause 500/speak Pauline "Yeah, it’s hard to imagine leaving this place behind once you’ve lived here.$1"/pause 600/speak Pauline "Well, it was nice talking to you @."/pause 600/speak Pauline "Work hard on your farm you hear? We'll see you around.$1"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.Pauline4Hearts/f Pauline 1000/e Pauline2: playful/34 24/farmer 82 24 1 Pauline 102 24 1/addTemporaryActor "Brown Cow" 32 32 99 19 2 false Animal Cow1/addTemporaryActor "Brown Cow" 32 32 94 20 1 false Animal Cow2/skippable/fade/viewport 98 24 true/showFrame Pauline 8/move farmer 16 0 1/emote Pauline 32/pause 1000/emote Pauline 16/faceDirection Pauline 3/speak Pauline "Oh, hey @! I didn’t expect to see you here at this time of the day.#$b#What am I doing?#$b#I’ve just been admiring these beautiful animals... They seem so happy.$1"/faceDirection Pauline 3/pause 500/faceDirection Pauline 0/speak Pauline "Look at them... so relaxed, so carefree.#$b#It's a far cry from the hustle and bustle of the city, don’t you think?"/move farmer 0 -1 0/facedirection farmer 0/pause 800/emote farmer 32/pause 500/facedirection farmer 1/pause 200/speak Pauline "In the city, everything is always moving so fast.#$b#People rushing from one place to another, deadlines, noise... you barely get a moment to breathe.#$b#But here, the pace is different. It’s almost like time stands still."/pause 1000/move Pauline 0 -1 0/speak Pauline "I wonder... do cows ever worry about anything$2?#$b#They seem so content, just living in the moment. No stress, no hurry... It must be nice, living like that."/emote Pauline 20/pause 500/speak Pauline "Sometimes I think we could learn a lot from them.#$b#In the city, it’s easy to get caught up in everything... but out here, it's like the world opens up, and you can finally breathe."/pause 500/facedirection Pauline 3/speak Pauline "Do you ever feel that way, @?#$b#Like maybe the simple life, is really the best life?$2"/question fork1 "#Yeah, I think you’re right.#I’m not sure I could live like that."/fork BadResponse1/pause 500/emote Pauline 32/friendship Pauline 100/speak Pauline "I knew you’d understand.#$b#There’s something magical about this kind of life, isn’t there?#$b#Simple, yet so full of meaning.$1" /playSound cow/pause 500/facedirection Pauline 0/facedirection farmer 0/pause 800/emote Pauline 32/facedirection Pauline 3/facedirection farmer 1/speak Pauline "Haha! Maybe they know something we don’t."/pause 800/speak Pauline "I should come here more often... it’s good for the soul."/emote farmer 32/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

What’s that sound?"/showFrame Pauline 8/emote Pauline 16/pause 600/jump Pauline/speak Pauline "Oh, hi!$6"/pause 500/speak Pauline "Oh no, I didn't realize you were there!$6#$b#I was so absorbed in my work... Entries.Pauline.Mail: Hi @,^^I’ve been thinking about our conversation at the beach and wanted to give you something special. It’s a piece of my art that captures the essence of that moment we shared.^^I hope it brings you as much joy as it did me.^^-Pauline  %item furniture 1557 %%[#]My gift to you

Entries.Pauline8Hearts/f Pauline 2000/e Pauline6: sadpiano/49 79/farmer 61 77 1 Pauline 49 79 2/skippable/fade/viewport 49 79 true/move farmer -7 0 3/emote farmer 16/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 3 /pause 500/showFrame Pauline 4/pause 500/speak Pauline "Oh, hey, @. I didn’t hear you walk up.#$b#This place is so peaceful... I come here when I need to think."/move Pauline 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Pauline "I got a call from my parents today...#$b#They’re asking me to come back home to the city."/pause 800/speak Pauline "They miss me, and... honestly, I miss them too.#$b#But the city? I don’t know if I can go back.$2"/move Pauline 0 -1 1/pause 500/speak Pauline "At first, I thought Stardew Valley was just a temporary escape from the noise and pressure of city life.#$b#A break from expectations."/pause 500/speak Pauline "But now, it’s more than that. It’s... home.#$b#I’ve grown to love the rhythm of the seasons, the quiet mornings and even the hard work.#$b#I never felt so connected to a place before."/pause 800/speak Pauline "But my parents... They don't understand."/question fork1 "#You need to follow your heart.#Maybe you should go back. Family is important."/fork OtherResponse/pause 500/friendship Pauline 100/speak Pauline "You're right, @. Only I can decide what makes me happy.$1"/emote Pauline 32/pause 1600/speak Pauline "I think I’ve already made my decision. Stardew Valley is my home now...#$b#I belong here, with the people I’ve grown to care about.$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Pauline "Thank you for reminding me of that. You always know just what to say."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.OtherResponse: pause 500/speak Pauline "You’re right.#$b#Family is important... and I don’t want to lose my connection with them.$2"/pause 500/speak Pauline "But I’m not the same person I was back in the city$2.#$b#I don’t know if I can go back to the life I had before.$2"/pause 500/speak Pauline "I guess I’ll need to think about it more.#$b#Maybe there’s a way to balance both... somehow.$2"/friendship Pauline 50/pause 1600/speak Pauline "Thanks for listening, @. It means a lot to me.$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

I really am.$1"/showFrame Pauline 49/pause 500/emote Pauline 16/pause 500/showFrame Pauline 50/speak Pauline "Oh! I have to go now, but we’ll talk again soon.$1#$b#I love you both!$1"/pause 500/showFrame Pauline 35/pause 1000/faceDirection Pauline 3/jump Pauline/speak Pauline "@! You won’t believe it!$1"/move Pauline 0 -1 3/move Pauline -6 0 2/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/speak Pauline "I just talked to my parents, and... they finally get it.#$b#They finally understand why I want to stay here.$1"/pause 500/speak Pauline "They accepted my decision.#$b#They know I’m happy here, and they’re happy for me.#$b#I can’t believe how well the conversation went!"/pause 700/speak Pauline "It feels like everything’s falling into place."/pause 500/speak Pauline "I couldn’t have done it without the support I’ve found here... and from you.$1"/question fork1 "#I’m so happy for you, Pauline! And now...$1#$b#I can truly enjoy it, without any doubt hanging over me..$1"/emote farmer 20/pause 500/speak Pauline "I’m so glad you’re a part of this journey with me.$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.BadResponse3: pause 500/playMusic shaneTheme/speak Pauline "Wait... what?$3#$b#You... you think I don’t belong here?$3"/pause 500/speak Pauline "I thought you, of all people, would understand why I needed to stay.$5"/pause 500/speak Pauline "I’ve found happiness here, @.$3#$b#I’ve worked hard to make this life for myself... but if you can’t see that, then maybe you never really knew me.$3"/friendship Pauline -500/pause 1600/faceDirection Pauline 0/speak Pauline "This place may be different from where I came from, but that doesn’t mean I don’t belong.$3"/pause 800/emote Pauline 12/move Pauline 0 -1 0/speak Pauline "I think you should leave.$5"/emote farmer 28//pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
